description: Situated in the historic centre near the ceramic museum (some of its pieces are also on display in the restaurant), Bino Ricchebuono boasts an attractive outdoor space in a charming small square. Michelin-starred chef Ricchebuono from Noli is the brains behind this restaurant, which serves fish and meat dishes prepared with a touch of creativity.
